question_text: Which scenario would most likely disable multi-channel operation on a dual-channel-capable motherboard?
answer_options: Installing ECC memory instead of non-ECC
Installing two memory modules with different capacities
Enabling XMP profiles in the BIOS
correct_answer: Installing two memory modules with different capacities
explanation: Multi-channel configurations usually require modules to match in capacity, speed, and preferably manufacturer to avoid fallback to single-channel mode.
